info.title: Slack Stars API
info.description: The API for management Slack Starss

get.summary: Adds a star to an item.
get.description: Adds a star to an item.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Channel to add star to, or channel where the message to add star to was posted (used with timestamp).

parameters.name: file_comment
parameters.description: File comment to add star to.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp of the message to add star to.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of results to return.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Show stars by this user. Defaults to the authed user.

get.summary: Removes a star from an item.
get.description: Removes a star from an item.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Channel to remove star from, or channel where the message to remove star from was posted (used with timestamp).

parameters.name: file_comment
parameters.description: File comment to remove star from.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp of the message to remove star from.
